homepage.title: MS Elevate LEAPS Tracker
homepage.subtitle: Empower Indonesian educators to adopt AI in classrooms through structured learning journey

hero.h1: Unlock AI. Transform Classrooms. Rise Together.
hero.subcopy: A national movement where teachers learn, apply, amplify, present, and shine—with points, badges, and real recognition.

leaps.intro: Your path to impact—earn points, unlock badges, move up the leaderboard.

learn.title: Learn (20 pts)
learn.body: Take the 1-hour or 4-hour AI for Educators, or "AI Agent in a Day." Upload your certificate. You've started.
learn.success: Certificate verified. +20 pts. Badge unlocked: Starter.

explore.title: Explore (50 pts)
explore.body: Run an AI-powered lesson in your classroom. Upload photos/docs and a brief reflection.
explore.success: Evidence received. +50 pts. Badge: In-Class Innovator.

amplify.title: Amplify (2 pts/peer, 1 pt/student)
amplify.body: Train peers/students. Submit attendance. Watch your points climb.

present.title: Present (20 pts)
present.body: Share your impact story on LinkedIn. Paste the post link to claim points.
present.success: Story verified. +20 pts. Badge: Community Voice.

shine.title: Shine (Recognition)
shine.body: Contribute your idea for education policy. Top 10–15 educators will be invited to the Jakarta convening.
shine.success: Idea received. You're eligible for convening review.

ripple.title: From one teacher to national impact
ripple.body: 150 Master Trainers → 15,000 Educators → 150,000 peers & students → 25,000 micro-credentials → 5,000 MCE certified.

flow.title: How Elevate works
bullets: MOE identifies participating schools; database anchors outreach.
Registration via form routes educators to the LEAPS tracker (Entry & Sign-In → Tracker).
Train-the-Trainer (online/offline). Master Trainers are paired with schools.
Each Master Trainer trains ≥100 educators; each educator cascades to peers/students.
Rural inclusion: offline materials for teachers in rural areas.

stories.title: Real classrooms. Real change.
stories.subcopy: See educators applying AI today—and share yours to inspire others.
stories.empty_state: Be among the first to start the movement.

educator.title: Start in one hour
educator.body: Take the 1-hour AI for Educators, upload your certificate, and claim 20 pts.

trainer.title: Lead a cohort of 100 educators
trainer.body: Join the Master Trainer pool (150–200). Get paired with schools and deliver online/offline sessions.

convening.title: Shine in Jakarta
convening.body: The top 10–15 educators—based on LEAPS points and policy ideas—will be invited to the Educators Convening in Jakarta for national recognition.
